name: Unstable Gardening
description:
Ever caught a heat wave in Winter and thought "Wow, that's weird"? Welcome to Andalusia, which prides itself in its extremely unstable (and unreliable) weather. From all places, you've chosen to sell flowers here... if you manage to keep them alive, that is.

Distribute your flowerpots and dodge thunderbolts as you try to make a decent living wage in Unstable Gardening!

Controls:

  • Drag and drop left click: move plants between spaces.
  • Q/E: Previous/next page.
  • Alt Gr: Swap font to a neutral sans serif

Made with ❤ by:

  • LdAuch
  • Nekuake
  • FeatheredLynx
  • HectorWiz
